Flow.description: LEM-13511: Sub Flow for Equipment Request Screen user inputs

dynamicChoiceSets.description: LEM-13511: Select product Bundle For Selected Country Code
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ProductBundleForSelectedCountryCode
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: ((1 OR 3) AND 2 AND (4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7))

dynamicChoiceSets.description: LEM-14124: Select product Bundle For Selected State
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ProductBundleForSelectedState

dynamicChoiceSets.description: LEM-13511: Lookup for defective Printer IMEI
dynamicChoiceSets.name: SelectDefectivePrinterIMEI

dynamicChoiceSets.description: LEM-13511: Store Table Order protocol except "Android Tablet (Merchant Owns)" or "POS and Tablet (Merchant Owns)"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TabletOrderProtocol

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Contact Record Error Message
formulas.name: ContactRecordErrorMessage

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Set Default Return Type For Return Request
formulas.name: DefaultComponentReturnType

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Set Default Shipment Type Based on Deck Rank Value
formulas.name: DefaultShipmentType

formulas.description: LEM-17073 : Allow for IMEIs not in DDMx to be entered manually in the Tablet Return/Replacement flow
formulas.name: displayManualIMEI

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Display Reason For Other Error Message
formulas.name: DisplayResonForOtherErrorMessage
formulas.expression: if(CONTAINS(Text({!MerchantOrder.Reason_for_Replacement__c}),'Other (please specify reason in notes)') && ISBLANK({!MerchantOrder.Replacement_Reason_Other__c}), true, false)

formulas.description: LEM-21339-It is used to disable Shipping Type when Request Type is 'Return Label Only'
formulas.name: disableShippingType
isPrinterEligible
formulas.expression: OR( AND( !ISBLANK(TEXT({!StoreAccount.Deck_Rank__c})), CONTAINS('Ace, King, King of Spades, Ace of Spades', TEXT({!StoreAccount.Deck_Rank__c})) ), AND( !ISBLANK({!storeExperience}), CONTAINS({!storeExperience}, 'Caviar') ), {!businessTopMxCount} > 0 )

formulas.description: LEM-13510: It is used to evaluate if the Request Type is Return Label Only.
formulas.name: IsRequestTypeReturnLabelOnly
ManualAndLooupValidation

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Display Error For Order Protocol Selection
formulas.name: OrderProtocolError

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Product Bundle Name
formulas.name: ProductBunaleName

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Reason For Replacement Error Message
formulas.name: ReasonForReplacementError

formulas.description: LEM-13505 : It evaluates "Replacement Reason Other" field length is greater than 255 characters.
formulas.name: ReplacementReasonOtherFieldLength

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Reason for Replacement for other
formulas.name: ResonForRelacementForOther

formulas.description: LEM-17073 : This formula is being used to validate manual or lookup entry
formulas.name: SelectedPrinterIMEI

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Product Selection Error
formulas.name: SelectedProductError

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Select Store Shipping Country
formulas.name: SelectedShippingCountryOptions

formulas.description: LEM-17073 : This formula is being used to validate manual or lookup entry
formulas.name: SelectedTableIMEI

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Set Reason For Other Value
formulas.name: SelectReasonForOther

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Select Order protocol List
formulas.name: StoreAccountOrderProtocolSelection

formulas.description: LEM-13511: Display an error on blank Tablet or Printer IMEI number
formulas.name: TabletOrPrinterBlankError

formulas.description: LEM-17397: It is used to display the Parent Work Order number on success banner message.
formulas.name: workOrderIdToDisplayBanner

Flow.label: SubFlow-Guided Equipment Request Order Screen

recordCreates.name: Create_Parent_Marketing_Kit_Work_Order
recordCreates.label: Create Parent Marketing Kit Work Order

recordCreates.label: Create Parent Tablet Work Order

recordLookups.label: Get New Work Order Record Detail

recordLookups.name: Get_Records_from_Marketing_Kit_Product_Bundle
recordLookups.label: Get Records from Marketing Kit Product Bundle

recordLookups.description: LEM-14124: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle.
recordLookups.name: Get_Records_from_Mx_Order_Product_Bundle
recordLookups.label: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle

recordLookups.description: LEM-14124: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle for Country Equals Canada.
recordLookups.name: Get_Records_from_Mx_Order_Product_Bundle_Canada
recordLookups.label: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle Canada

recordLookups.description: LEM-14124: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle for State Equals Quebec.
recordLookups.name: Get_Records_from_Mx_Order_Product_Bundle_Quebec
recordLookups.label: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle Quebec

recordLookups.description: LEM-14124: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle excluding printer bundles.
recordLookups.name: Get_Records_from_Mx_Order_Product_Bundle_Without_Printer
recordLookups.label: Get Records from Mx Order Product Bundle (Without Printer)
recordLookups.filterLogic: ((1 OR 3) AND 2 AND (4 OR 5) AND NOT(6))

screens.description: LEM_13511 : Screen for create Order and WorkOrder Record
screens.name: Create_Order
screens.label: Create Order

fields.name: Store_Order_Protocol_Message
fields.fieldText: ﻿Ensure Store Order Protocol contains Tablet before continuing. If Mx is changing order protocol to Tablet, please exit this flow and amend the contract.

fields.name: Manual_Entry_Defective_Tablet_IMEI
fields.helpText: If the IMEI does not appear in the Defective Tablet IMEI search, please enter it here.

fields.name: Manual_Entry_Defective_Printer_IMEI
fields.helpText: If the IMEI does not appear in the Defective Printer IMEI search, please enter it here.
